## Welcome to Quarto Club!

Hi! We started this website to help showcase the many amazing websites that can be created using [Quarto](https://www.quarto.org). Feel free to look around and get inspired!

## How to add your site to the club?

1. Fork the repository
2. Add your `.png` thumbnail to the `websites/` directory
3. Add your listing to the `gallery.yml` file
4. Submit a pull request!
